moveBook.value:
Move grabbed book or
grabbed zoomed-in book

grabButtonHelpText.value: Look for grab buttons. Once grabbed, use keyboard shortcuts to move book or zoomed-in book.

moveBookWith.value: Move grabbed book or zoomed-in book up, left, down, or right with Arrow keys, or with letter keys W, A, S, or D.

moveInSmallerStepsWith.value: Move slower with Shift plus Arrow keys, or Shift plus letter keys W, A, S, or D.

initialKeyboardGrabbedNotTouching.value: Grabbed. Lightly on Physics book. Move book with W, A, S, or D key. Space to release.

initialTouchGrabbedNotTouching.value: Grabbed. Lightly on Physics book. Drag finger to move book. Lift finger to release.

initialKeyboardGrabbedTouching.value: Grabbed. Rub fast or slow with A or D keys. Space to release.

initialTouchGrabbedTouching.value: Grabbed. Rub fast or slow dragging left or right. Lift to release.

sentence.value: Chemistry book has {{comparisonAmount}} jiggling atoms as {{breakAwayAmount}} have broken away.{{space}}

jiggleTemperatureScaleSentence.value: In zoomed-in view of where books meet, {{temperatureClause}}, {{jigglingClause}}.

continueRubbing.value: Grab Chemistry book to rub fast or slow.

startingChemistryBookPattern.value: {{relativeChemistryBookSentence}}Chemistry book rests on top of a Physics book, and is ready to be rubbed against it.

startingChemistryBookLightlyPattern.value: {{relativeChemistryBookSentence}}Chemistry book rests lightly on top of a Physics book, and is ready to be rubbed against it.

resetSimMoreObservationSentence.value: Reset sim to make more observations.

atomsJiggleTinyBitTempCool.value: Atoms jiggle a tiny bit, temperature cool.

breakAwaySentenceFirst.value: {{temp}}. Atoms break away from chemistry book.

readMeOverview.value: Friction is an interactive sim. It changes as you play with it. Get ready for Friction, thereâ€™s a stack of big textbooks ready to go. In zoomed-in view of textbooks you can observe how jiggling atoms and temperature change.
